/doc/06_bms_modbus.note01: Here are the actions related to the BMS modbus inputs

checkInputs_bms.note: Sets ifChanged to false to allow ESS Controller to process inputs in case the value has not changed, but still needs to be processed

enum.note: Bit 0 - Stop
Bit 0 - Stop
